p.em: To provide Education,Training , Research and Consultancy in order to produce leaders in the field of Cooperative development,Community DevelopmentRural transformation,Business ,Applied sciences, information and communication technology for development.
A leading university in Cooperative Training, Education, Research and Innovation
To develop a globally competitive Cooperative university that is excellent in education,Training, Research,Innovation and Outreach

ul.li: Cooperation: Teamwork through synergy to achieve objectives.
Equity: Fairness and justice to all the stakeholders.
integrity: Upholding strong ethical and moral principles.
Professionalism: Maintaining High standards in service delivery.
Accountability: Demonstrate responsibility for decisions made and actions taken.
Creativity and innovation: Encourage generation and nurturing

resources.string:
"
"Mission:"
" To provide Education,Training , Research and Consultancy in order to produce leaders in the field of Cooperative development,Community DevelopmentRural transformation,Business ,Applied sciences, information and communication technology for development. "
" "
"Vision:"
" A leading university in Cooperative Training, Education, Research and Innovation. "
" "
"Motto:"
" Quality cooperative training "
" "
"Objective:"
" To develop a globally competitive Cooperative university that is excellent in education,Training, Research,Innovation and Outreach.

" Core Values"

Cooperation: Teamwork through synergy to achieve objectives."

integrity: Upholding strong ethical and moral principles."
